xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: This is a library module offering the same set of functions defined by Microsoft Excel, under Logical Functions.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Sorin Nasoi

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns TRUE if all its arguments are TRUE; FALSE if one or more arguments are FALSE.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: TRUE if all its arguments are TRUE; FALSE if one or more arguments are FALSE.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-logical:and
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function excel-logical:and($arg1 as xs:anyAtomicType, $arg2 as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:boolean

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns TRUE if all its arguments are TRUE; FALSE if one or more arguments are FALSE.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: TRUE if all its arguments are TRUE; FALSE if one or more arguments are FALSE.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-logical:and
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function excel-logical:and($values as xs:anyAtomicType*) as xs:boolean

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns one value if a condition you specify evaluates to TRUE and another value if it evaluates to FALSE.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $logical_test is any value or expression that can be evaluated to TRUE or FALSE.
$value_if_true the value that is returned if logical_test is TRUE.
$value_if_false the value that is returned if logical_test is FALSE.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: One value if a condition you specify evaluates to TRUE and another value if it evaluates to FALSE.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-logical:if
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function excel-logical:if($logical_test as xs:boolean, $value_if_true as item()*, $value_if_false as item()*) as item()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns TRUE if any argument is TRUE; FALSE if all arguments are FALSE.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: TRUE if any argument is TRUE; FALSE if all arguments are FALSE.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-logical:or
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function excel-logical:or($arg1 as xs:anyAtomicType, $arg2 as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:boolean

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns TRUE if any argument is TRUE; FALSE if all arguments are FALSE.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: TRUE if any argument is TRUE; FALSE if all arguments are FALSE.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-logical:or
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function excel-logical:or($values as xs:anyAtomicType*) as xs:boolean
